scenes.background: Monica glances at Bob, then turns to you.
scenes.description: So, whats the plan? Do we just keep butting heads?

options.text: Sometimes conflict is unavoidable, but it can lead to better solutions.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the inevitability of conflict but suggest it can be constructive, showing good perception and motivation but lower empathy.

options.text: Monica, you have a point. We need a strategy to align our approaches.
options.analysis: You agree with Monica, showing good self-regulation and social skills while recognizing the need for strategic alignment.

options.text: Maybe we should just let each person handle things their own way.
options.analysis: You suggest a hands-off approach, showing a balanced view but potentially lower social skill in fostering teamwork.
